Use a power strip to plug in your computer so that you can access it from anywhere in your room or office.
To organize and neatly hold multiple cords and power cables to keep your desk or workstation looking neat and tidy.
I like that you can use this power strip to charge multiple devices at once without a bunch of cords lying around.
A power strip helps me to keep cords organized and out of the way, which helps me organize my life and my stuff better.
Charges multiple devices at once so you don't have to carry around a bunch of chargers.
